## MediaFile Articles

While at MediaFileDC, a student run online news source, I spoke to various academics and experts while covering stories on the international beat. My [stories](https://www.mediafiledc.com/author/sfarooqi/) ranged from the Western media coverage of Afghan women, to the media scrutiny Meghan Markle faced from the UK press.

## GW Hatchet Articles 

At The Hatchet, I covered two [stories](https://www.gwhatchet.com/author/samiha-farooqi/) on campus involving the implentation of GW's u-pass program, and the student and university responses to an assault, interviewing several students in the process.
